story:
¿Qué?

El conocimiento de embarque une las características clásicas de la novela de misterio y espionaje, dejando aparte convencionalismos del género, para a través de una verdad histórica desarrollar un trepidante relato de intriga, amor y suspense.

Cuando el abogado Mariano del Río recibió el encargo de recuperar una carga embarcada décadas atrás, no podía imaginar el desenlace de los acontecimientos que desencadenaría su investigación. La búsqueda de los objetos descritos en el único documento que recibiría como prueba de su existencia, le llevará a puertos remotos siguiendo la ruta del buque que los transportó. A partir de ese momento el abogado y su compañera se verán envueltos en la lucha de dos viejos enemigos.

Londres, Hamburgo, Buenos Aires o Panamá serán algunos de los escenarios en los que se encuentran las claves de un fabuloso misterio que se ha mantenido oculto desde entonces.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una editorial con voluntad de cambio, de publicar obras poco convencionales pero de indudable calidad, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para promocionar cada título cuando esta todavía se encuentra en proceso de edición.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Sergio Martínez de Maturana.

Licenciado en Derecho y abogado. Colabora con artículos semanales con el grupo editorial Andalucía Información en su edición del Campo de Gibraltar desde 2012. Inició su actividad literaria desde la poesía, siendo galardonado en varias ocasiones en concursos literarios en el ámbito de la Universidad Complutense de Madrid. En la actualidad trabaja como abogado senior en una compañía naviera en Copenhague (Dinamarca). El conocimiento de embarque es su primera novela y ya prepara nuevas aventuras de su protagonista Mariano del Río.

¿Por qué?

Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:

«La fría brisa hacía lagrimar los ojos azules de Hanne y le distorsionaba la visión. Veía a distancia lo que parecían luces de una ambulancia, tenía tanto frío que no era capaz de pensar en otra cosa que en tomar una taza té caliente nada más llegar al museo.
          Cuando se hubo acercado, vio que el cuerpo de un hombre yacía en el suelo, miró por pura e insana curiosidad y tras dudar unos segundos, para su mayor sorpresa descubrió que era Matthias el que se encontraba inmóvil sobre la húmeda y fría calzada. No supo bien cómo reaccionar, apenas le conocía y sentía reparo por acercarse al cuerpo inerte. En un instante, resolvió llamar a Bernhard quien era realmente su amigo. Ella le contó angustiada al teléfono lo que estaba viendo y el otro le dijo que no se moviese de donde estaba, que llegaría enseguida.
          Hanne reconoció a uno de los policías que estaban alejando a los pocos curiosos del lugar del accidente. Era un tipo inmenso, probablemente pasaba los dos metros de estatura, complexión muy ancha, ojos azules y enfundado en el uniforme de la policía de la ciudad hanseática que es de un azul marino tan oscuro que parece negro. La abogada atendía muchos casos de delincuentes de poca monta que no podían pagarse un letrado y recurrían a los servicios gratuitos de asistencia jurídica al detenido.
          Qué pequeño es el mundo, no es tan grande el departamento de Policía de Hamburgo, se dijo mientras se acercaba hacia él.
          —Hola agente ¿sabe qué ha pasado al joven que está en el suelo? — preguntó Hanne sin rodeos.
          —Buenos días, abogada—replicó el oficial—, aún es pronto para decirlo y hay que esperar a que llegue el juez para certificarlo, pero mucho me temo que este joven está muerto.
          —Pero ¿se sabe cómo ha sido? —preguntó con la voz rota.
          —Como le he dicho, es pronto para saberlo. Mi compañero Jens, ese que está sentado en el coche patrulla, ha estado preguntando y al parecer ha sido un atropello».

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 960€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Aviso para navegantes: La opción RESPALDAR es únicamente para realizar donaciones a la edición, por lo que no habrá comunicaciones posteriores en busca de datos de envío... cualquiera de las opciones válidas de reserva exige cumplimentar formulario para poder servir el pedido.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Sergio Martínez de Maturana vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

Política de Privacidad

story:
Que?

Que vén Kokolka! é unha fábula moderna que profundiza en temas como a identidade ou a vontade de non aceptar os obstáculos do destino.

A cidade de Vilanova de Amarante, sumida sempre en silencio e nunha cotiá e gozosa melancolía, espera a chegada de Kokolka, antigo príncipe nórdico, coa finalidade de levala consigo para ampliar a súa colección particular aló nas súas frías e venteadas terras. Leandro, o protagonista desta historia, intentará descifrar os sinais que evidencian a súa chegada e, a través dos soños e do amor por Caterina, frear a destrución de todo un mundo.

Novela de formación, Que vén Kokolka! pretende ser, ante todo, unha homenaxe á literatura de pura fabulación e reivindica, através da forza da palabra, a importancia de ser fiel a un mesmo e a un territorio.

Quen?

Do Peirao é unha editorial con vontade de cambio, de dar a alternativa a autores que non a atopan noutro lugar, con novas e refrescantes ideas como é o empregar unha campaña preventa para valorar a aceptación e viabilidade de cada título.

Deste xeito es ti, agora que te estás expondo como colaborar, o que decide se a obra que che presentamos verá a luz pasando a formar parte do noso catálogo... porque consideramos ao lector parte fundamental do proceso.

Hoxe presentámosche a Rubén Anido Regueiro.

Nado en Paderne (A Coruña) en 1979 é profesor de lingua e literatura no ensino medio. Ten publicado diversos traballos de divulgación en Encrucillada, Revista galega de ensino e, tamén, na publicación periódica da Asociación Cultural Irmáns Suárez Picallo, de Sada, da que é socio.

En 2002, sendo estudante da Universidade da Coruña, gañou o IX Premio de Creación Literaria e Ensaio da Facultade de Filoloxía na modalidade de narrativa co relato «O retorno de Alcarabán» e en 2013 conseguiu un accésit no XL Premio de Narracións Breves Modesto Figueiredo co texto intitulado «O cabaleiro, a dama e o dragón».

Por que?

Por aquí un fragmento do texto como mostra:

«Sentado nunha pena fronte á cidade, Leandro soñaba que o ceo se cubría de mestas nubes a deixaren caer sobre as rúas e os tellados auga fría de inverno crecedeiro. Desde o alto pareceulle que Vilanova de Amarante non era máis do que unha ilusión con forma de dedal de costureira, como una estraño barco varado na ribeira, onde seu pai tiña o taller. Soñaba tamén que se achegaba a Caterina e lle dicía algo, calquera cousa, e ela sorría, e dáballe a man, e levábao a un lugar tan secreto que ninguén os podería atopar, e ao final o tempo non existía, como tampouco existía o mundo, nin sequera a cidade e moito menos Kokolka.
          Entrepechou os ollos e puido tocar o vestido vaporoso, suave como o aire perfumado das hortas da cidade, con aquilo que o viña acompañando desde a nenez, cando seu pai lle intentaba explicar a medida das cousas sen conseguilo nunca de todo, inevitabelmente».

Como?

Para arrincar o proxecto fixámonos como obxectivo 840€; esta é a cantidade que recadariamos se ao redor de cincuenta mecenas se fixesen, cada cal, cun exemplar desta primeira edición.

  • Tendo acceso ás galeradas de edición.
  • Recibindo un exemplar semanas antes da saída ao mercado da obra.
  • Aínda que, tamén poderías ver o teu nome nos agradecementos achegando un pouco máis.

Ademais...

Sabemos que son tempos difíciles, tamén nós os sufrimos, e é posible que non esteas en disposición de apoiarnos co teu mecenado nestes momentos... pero agardamos que se isto te chegou á alma, mesmo se talvez coñeces en persoa ao autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-orella... ) para que academos a nosa meta e Rubén Anido Regueiro vexa publicada a súa obra.

Grazas polo voso tempo.

Política de privacidade

Ten publicado diversos traballos de divulgación en Encrucillada, Revista galega de ensino e, tamén, na publicación periódica da Asociación Cultural Irmáns Suárez Picallo, de Sada, da que é socio.En 2002, sendo estudante da Universidade da Coruña, gañou o IX Premio de Creación Literaria e Ensaio da Facultade de Filoloxía na modalidade de narrativa co relato «O retorno de Alcarabán» e en 2013 conseguiu un accésit no XL Premio de Narracións Breves Modesto Figueiredo co texto intitulado «O cabaleiro, a dama e o dragón».Por que?Por aquí un fragmento do texto como mostra:«Sentado nunha pena fronte á cidade, Leandro soñaba que o ceo se cubría de mestas nubes a deixaren caer sobre as rúas e os tellados auga fría de inverno crecedeiro. Desde o alto pareceulle que Vilanova de Amarante non era máis do que unha ilusión con forma de dedal de costureira, como una estraño barco varado na ribeira, onde seu pai tiña o taller. Soñaba tamén que se achegaba a Caterina e lle dicía algo, calquera cousa, e ela sorría, e dáballe a man, e levábao a un lugar tan secreto que ninguén os podería atopar, e ao final o tempo non existía, como tampouco existía o mundo, nin sequera a cidade e moito menos Kokolka.          Entrepechou os ollos e puido tocar o vestido vaporoso, suave como o aire perfumado das hortas da cidade, con aquilo que o viña acompañando desde a nenez, cando seu pai lle intentaba explicar a medida das cousas sen conseguilo nunca de todo, inevitabelmente».Como?Para arrincar o proxecto fixámonos como obxectivo 840€; esta é a cantidade que recadariamos se ao redor de cincuenta mecenas se fixesen, cada cal, cun exemplar desta primeira edición.
Tendo acceso ás galeradas de edición.
Recibindo un exemplar semanas antes da saída ao mercado da obra.
Aínda que, tamén poderías ver o teu nome nos agradecementos achegando un pouco máis.
Ademais...Sabemos que son tempos difíciles, tamén nós os sufrimos, e é posible que non esteas en disposición de apoiarnos co teu mecenado nestes momentos... pero agardamos que se isto te chegou á alma, mesmo se talvez coñeces en persoa ao autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-orella... ) para que academos a nosa meta e Rubén Anido Regueiro vexa publicada a súa obra.Grazas polo voso tempo.Política de privacidade

story:
¿Te has dado cuenta, que muchos hogares se están destruyendo? ¿Qué las relaciones se han vuelto desechables? ¿Qué hemos perdido la capacidad de disfrutar de las cosas sencillas? Estamos viviendo tan de prisa, tan preocupados y estresados que estamos sacrificando momentos valiosos con nuestras personas especiales, y el tiempo se nos va…

Es por esto, que nació El Reto de los 3 meses, es un juego que pretende rescatar la esencia del ser humano, recuperar lo que nos hace felices, que es el tener  tiempo de calidad, el ser agradecido y sentirnos valorados por las personas que más amamos, es tener con nuestra pareja una relación sana, llena de buenos hábitos que mantienen al amor en una base sólida pero sin dejar de enamorándonos ni un solo día, impidiendo que la monotonía apague esa magia.

Por el contrario se trata de tener una vida, en donde con la pareja nos inspiremos mutuamente a ser mejores humanos, a vivir la vida de una manera intensa y mágica, llena de valores , palabras amables, sueños que construir juntos.

Es un reto que mejora la vida emocional de muchas personas, más hogares se mantienen juntos, y más niños CRECEN FELICES porque pueden ver que sus PAPÁS SE AMAN.

 

Soy Paz, y siento que mi nombre para mi representa mucho. Soy Psicóloga Clínica. Y me encanta mi carrera.

Mis papás son divorciados y aunque tuvieron siempre una muy buena relación, debo confesar que me hubiera gustado que hubiesen permanecido juntos. El trabajo con muchas parejas en mi consultorio ayudó a que este proyecto pueda desarrollarse.

Conforme acudían muchas parejas al consultorio, todos por la misma razón en donde habían entrado a crisis muy fuertes de infidelidad, peleas fuertes o por aburrimiento y estar cansados el uno del otro, me di cuenta que el aburrimiento y una vida monóta en una pareja puede acabar con todo.

Fui creando poco a poco las técnicas y se los mandaba a hacer cada semana, y con me fui dando cuenta que tenía muy buenos resultados en su relación. Ahí es cuando decidí crear el reto de los 3 meses, y perfeccioné cada una de las técnicas para crear un juego donde no sea necesario acudir a terapia para contrarrestar esto, sino cada pareja tengas las herramientas en sus manos para trabajar.

Estoy muy agradecida porque para formar el R3 se juntaron personas con mis mismos ideales en donde plasmaron todo su talento para crear el reto, y de esa manera somos un grupo de personas que hemos puesto el corazón a cada uno de los detalles para el proyecto. Y ahora queremos que todo el mundo pueda tener acceso y para esto hacemos la campaña.

  

 

 

Las cajas estarán disponibles para su compra física en Ecuador y España. La versión digital podrá estar disponible para todos los países, principalmente en inglés y español.

 

El equipo necesita 30.000 usd, para lanzar el proyecto, dinero que será destinado a la producción de cajas, desarrollo de la versión digital en inglés, producción de videos, gastos de administración, y comenzar con " El reto social" que es el plan dentro de El Reto de los 3 meses, que pretende donar porcentaje de las ganancias a proyectos que ayuden a personas de bajos recursos a poder desarrollarse y crecer.

En caso de no llegar a la meta, donaremos ese dinero a pequeñas obras sociales. Eso es lo que nos llena y nos hace felices. 

Confiamos en la humanidad. Confiamos en que podemos mejorar este mundo. Confiamos en que podemos rescatar la esencia del ser humano. Y estamos seguros que aún el amor puede ser una herramienta muy poderosa.

Por eso creemos que por medio de El reto de los 3 meses podemos crear una comunidad donde compartimos estos mismos ideales, y juntar fuerzas para hacer grandes obras , comenzando desde el origen, en nuestro HOGAR.

Súmate y ayúdanos a compartir el SUEÑO con más personas.

story:
!!! Faaar Out, the book

I’m Carl Franzen. I wrote the song, “On the Road,” which John Denver recorded on his Back Home Again album. Now I’ve written a book about Young John Denver—stories about John before he became famous. 

This book started as an oral history project. I went on the road with my camera to interview people who befriended or influenced John Denver before he became famous. As I researched and listened, the idea evolved. The project became a book. Not a history book but a genealogy journal. You’ll see stories that reveal John’s confidence, his energy, and the unique talents he shared. Threads that weave from one person to another, connections that generously set the table for his iconic career.

My purpose was not to rewrite John’s narrative, but to offer a glimpse into his coming of age, and his arrival at the doorstep of fame. Sometimes the storytellers take over and become more important than the reader might expect. It’s as if we are participants at a pickin’ party, each with a different instrument, each with a favorite song to sing. Smiling, strumming, playing a catchy riff to grab your attention. Always, however, with a single destination:  Who was Young John Denver?​

What's inside this book?

I take the reader on a journey from Randy Sparks, who gave John his first boost, to the Chad Mitchell Trio, which led to John's first blush with fame and the introduction to his political will. And finally, to the recording of his breakout hit, "Take Me Home, Country Roads."

I was delighted to meet the real Bobbie from John's first song, "For Bobbie." Bill Danoff took me back to working sound and lights at the Cellar Door in Washington D.C, where John first sang "Take Me Home Country Roads." And while Jim Connor played "Grandma's Feather Bed," a chicken squawked in his back yard in Alabama.

I talked with the priest who guided the Chad Mitchell Trio to New York and introduced them to Nina Simone's agent, who led them to Milt Okun. In Minnesota, I was fascinated by all the introductions Nancy Nelson made on John's behalf, included to the DJ who first played the grooves out of "Country Roads" before it charted. And I heard what happened when John called Annie's dormatory to ask for a first date. 

I'm looking for a few good readers

This book will begin as a Limited Reader Edition, 100 copies for patient readers who enjoy letting the story come to them. I'd like you to be one of those valuable readers. 

I will send you a signed, first edition of !!! Faaar Out, and regardless of your feelings after receiving the book—good or bad—I invite you to write a review and post it here, or share your thoughts with friends on social media. Of course, I hope it delights and surprises you.

Mail might be slow

Domestic delivery of a book is generally not fast, and with with recent changes to the U.S. Postal Service, all I can say is, be patient. International shipment can take up to four weeks to arrive.  

Other ways you can help

Please share this campaign with friends who you know to be John Denver fans. And thanks for reading this far.

Guarantee

Indiegogo lawyers say "Your donation is a way to support a project but does not guarantee that you will receive a perk." Carl says, "You will get your book."

story:
Short Summary

Hello and thanks for your interest in this story!

I'm an award-winning investigative journalist with a track record of breaking major stories for publications such as The Independent,  Al Jazeera, The Guardian and the Sunday Herald, including front page splashes that have shaped the news agenda.

I have recently been investigating the Cambridge Analytica story and was the first journalist to reveal their links to the Conservative Party and have exposed further holes in the government's statements on the issue, in my articles for Bella Caledonia.

Journalism at its core should be about holding power to account. That's why I am determined to investigate this story further. With a catalogue of elections interfered in from Nigeria to Bulgaria, Brexit to Trump, rarely have we seen such unaccountable power wielded as shown by Cambridge Analytica and SCL Group. What's really concerning is that they appear to have close ties to our own state institutions.  With your support, I will investigate:

  • The worldwide activities of SCL Group and which governments and organisations they have collaborated with
  • The background and political links of SLC Group's board, directors and shareholders
  • How closely has the British government worked with Cambridge Analytica/SLC Group to interfere in elections and democracies globally?
  • If SLC Group is really just a private arm of the British Ministry of Defence?
  • How big a role did SCL Group/Cambridge Analytica/Aggregate IQ play in Brexit?
  • How closely is SCL Group tied to the US state department? 
  • What other elections or referendum were they involved in? For instance was there any involvement in the Scottish independence referendum in 2014? 
  • What was the cause of Dan Muresan (Christopher Wylie's predecessor) mysterious death in Kenya? 

These are just some of the areas I will begin investigating, if there is anything you don't think is being covered, then get in touch and I will look into it!  

What We Need & What You Get

In order to fully investigative this issue, it will take time and resources. With your support, I can put other projects to one side and dedicate the coming weeks (and possibly longer) to investigating this issue fully. Along the way I will give regular updates via: 

  • A series of articles on the website Bella Caledonia, as well as regular updates on Twitter
  • Working with Phantom Power films, I will give regular video updates and we will also interview other experts on this subject 
  • To funders, I will be directly contactable and available to provide news, discuss findings and  other leads or issues of interest

The Impact

Good investigative journalism keeps people in power in check. The fantastic work done by the Observer (in particular Carole Cadwalladr) and Channel 4 News has brought this issue to light. With your help, we can make sure it does not slip back into the darkness and:

  • Keep the heat on Cambridge Analytica/SCL Group and their global partners 
  • Ensure this story keeps getting the attention it deserves 
  • Investigate properly the full global aspect of the story - ALL the countries that have been involved. 
  • Delve into the government links that have been so far largely overlooked

Risks & Challenges

Investigating a murky world of election rigging by global actors won't be easy. There are powerful interest groups who don't want information about their activities to come out.  I will be dogged in the search for the truth about these organisations and their partners. As George Orwell said:  “Journalism is printing what someone else does not want printed: everything else is public relations.”

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand not everyone will be in a position to contribute financially. But that doesn't mean you can't help! You can still support the campaign by:

  • Firstly, sharing the fundraiser on social media and among friends. With the resources I won't be able to investigate this fully!
  • Once the campaign is funded, sharing the articles, videos and tweets about SLC Group to a wider audience

Thank you for your support in whatever way you are able - it's hugely appreciated!

story:
Story of my book

Trillion Dollar Fortune is a book about how India will join the United States and China to become the world’s third-largest economy and emerge as a leader in sustainable development this decade. The COVID-19 pandemic has ravaged the world’s economies and exposed the harsh vulnerabilities in the global system. The stark differences between the developed world and developing world highlight that there is much more work to be done in global development. Through insights from leaders across business, technology, academia, governments, and nonprofit organizations, my book will help you pave an understanding of how entrepreneurship and innovation can be used to tackle urgent issues such as demographic shifts, artificial intelligence, climate change, and poverty.

My name is Faeez Juneja, and I am the author of Trillion Dollar Fortune. I wrote this book because I am passionate about sustainability, technology, and globalization. I was born in India but raised in the United States for most of my life. I have moved across different cities in my life, and I have witnessed the stark contrast between the life I was living and the lives of others. My observations have also reflected on the transformative impact that technology and business have on uplifting communities, especially in India. I want to explore ways we can harness innovation to achieve the UN Sustainable Development Goals and build a more equitable future.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how India will be joining the United States and China to become a global power later this decade and the geopolitical, economic, environmental, and technological opportunities that a rising India will have for the world. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for business and sustainability . And then, ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you understand the key trends that are shaping our collective future and how you can be a part of the new post-pandemic world that emphasizes social impact over shareholder profit.

In this book, you'll learn about India's rise in global development and international business. Some of these topics include:

  • Why India is the fifth-largest economy in the world, how it can reach its $5 trillion target through becoming more sustainable and inclusive, and why transforming India will be the biggest business opportunity of the century. I will explore how Invest India has become the top investment promotion agency, attracting over $161 billion in foreign direct investment pipeline alone across all sectors.
  • How India is the world’s third-largest contributor to greenhouse gas emissions but also has emerged as a global leader in renewable energy. India is the only major country in the world that remains on track to overachieve its 2°C compatible Paris Agreement climate action targets. I will explore how India can become a success story for developing countries that want to achieve economic growth while combating climate change.
  • The rise of the Indo-Pacific region in geopolitics and global business as the US bolsters its presence in the region by building deeper cooperation with India and countries such as Japan, Australia, and South Korea to balance China’s $1 Trillion Brick and Road Initiative.

You will love this book if you are interested in innovative solutions and shaping the world’s responses to the most urgent technological, economic, and social challenges in a global context.

Trillion Dollar Fortune is a non-fiction book that speaks to international business professionals and technology enthusiasts who are looking at sustainability, India, and geopolitics for the first time.

The Book - Trillion Dollar Fortune

The book is written in 3 Parts:

Part 1 contains the Introduction and Chapters 1-2. This part will focus on exploring the global order today, the role that the US and China are playing, the critical challenges that the world faces, and the need for India to emerge as a global power. There are insights on how China emerged as the world’s largest economy by purchasing power parity in just 40 years and how the country is building a new geopolitical, economic, and technological architecture for the 21st century. I also explore how the United States and China will be competing in artificial intelligence development to become the dominant superpowers.

 

Part 2 contains Chapters 3-7. This part will focus on why India will emerge as the next big global powerhouse after the United States and China. It will include chapters on India’s background, the fourth industrial revolution, the economy and international business, sustainable development, and geopolitics. One of the stories explored in the book includes the rise of Digital India and how the country has the largest biometric identification system, lowest data rates, and is home to a booming startup ecosystem.   • The Cover Design of my book - the mockups you see currently are placeholders!

  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Winter

 

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

  • A personally signed copy of my book
  • A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your name will appear in a Special Acknowledgements section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experience of writing my book
  • And more...

 

About the Author 

Faeez Juneja is a third year in the honors program at the University of Georgia, pursuing degrees in economics and statistics with a certificate in Personal and Organizational Leadership. He is a Leonard Leadership Scholar in the Institute for Leadership Advancement, a two-year program for the top 30 undergraduate business students at the Terry College of Business. He is an alum of the American Enterprise Institute, where he studied democratic capitalism in the summer honors program, and mentee at the Research in Color Foundation at Princeton University.

Previously, he was in the Richard B. Russell Security Leadership Program at the Center for International Trade and Security, policy training coordinator for Roosevelt at UGA (student-run think tank), and marketing director for the Georgia Political Review. In 2019-2020, he became one of the first six India Student Hub undergraduate students to become a representative of the Embassy of India to universities. Among other things, he is also lead editor of the Embassy of India’s Student Hub Magazine, member of the Blue Key Honors Society, and an award-winning public speaker.

He wrote this book because he is passionate about improving the state of the world through working at the intersection of business and government. He would like to educate people about social impact and inspire the next generation of youth leaders.

Faeez is an ambitious twenty-year-old with a dream to travel to all seven continents. He loves exploring new cities, watching the latest Netflix original with his friends, and learning about new cultures.

For more information, you can connect with Faeez at faeez.juneja@gmail.com, Twitter @faeezjune, and LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/faeezj/. 

 

Risks & Challenges 

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Faeez Juneja

story:
About the project

Leila Ann Soltau was a talented writer and artist who sadly passed away from a brain tumour in 2012 at the age of 30. Needless to say, it is a tragedy that her considerable talents were prevented from reaching maturity. 

This campaign has been set up in order to produce a book that brings together a range of work that Leila produced throughout her adult life and from various places in the UK and US. The book, titled Unsteady, was born from a desire to share a vital part of her personality with her friends, family and the world at large.

By funding this campaign you will be helping us create a physical artifact of Leila’s creative legacy. We will also be donating the proceeds from the sale of the book to The Young Women’s Music Project and Helen & Douglas House, charities that are both local to Leila’s hometown of Oxford.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are aiming to raise £650.

This money will go towards helping fund the printing of a beautifully bound hardback book containing a compilation of Leila’s writing and drawing. All proceeds from sales of the book will be donated to The Young Women’s Music Project and Helen & Douglas House.

The perks of funding the campaign are simple – For pledging £20 you will receive your very own copy of Unsteady. In addition to this we are also offering a high quality art print of Leila's raining cloud tattoo. This will be A5 sized and printed on heavy weight paper using archival quality ink.

The Impact

This book has not been easy to put together but in doing so we hope that in some ways at least we can honour Leila’s creative legacy and provide those who knew her with something to remember her by.

About The Young Women’s Music Project

Based in Oxford, The Young Women's Music Project (YWMP) is an educational charity that offers twice-monthly free workshops for women aged 14-21, which provides an inclusive and supportive space for young women to make music together, learn new skills, express themselves, and grow in confidence.

Female empowerment is certainly one of the reoccurring themes within Unsteady. We are sure that Leila would be thrilled to be contributing to a charity that embodies so many of the ideals she held.

More about YWMP can be found at www.ywmp.org.uk

About Helen & Douglas House

Helen & Douglas House provides hospice & palliative care to children and young adults in Oxfordshire & surrounding counties. It was here that Leila passed away in 2012. The support and care given to Leila at the end of her life by the team at H&D was incredible.

More about Helen & Douglas House can be found at www.helenanddouglas.org.uk

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Leila lived in many places during her life; Oxford, London, New York and California to name a few. We have done our best to contact as many people who knew her as possible, but there will always be some we are unaware of or have no contact details for. If you could share this with anyone who knew her and help raise awareness we would be incredibly grateful.

We are also aware that it’s not possible for everybody to contribute but it would help the project immensely if you could spare a moment to share the project via social media or communication of your choice.

Many thanks for taking the time to view this project.

Humprey, Joe and Stu

story:
Short Summary

The humorous children's novel, The Lockdown Letters of Professor Farnsworth Shakespeare, grew out of a series of fun letters that Irfan Shah began writing for his nephews, Thomas and Louis, and niece, Anika. They were written to give the kids a giggle during lockdown. They giggled so much, Irfan decided to turn the stories into a book.

With the help of his partner, Tracie, Irfan also decided to take fate into his own hands and publish the book himself. To this end, both he and Tracie learned how to book-bind and made the first prototype copies at the beginning of this year.

The story of the disaster-prone Professor is meant to provide some light relief during the grim days of lockdown, and although it is silly in the extreme, it is also hopeful, and a way of facing the troubles around us with humour and imagination.

What We Need & What You Get

The book has been released as an ebook for Kindle but we want to turn it into a real, physical artefact. A proper Book! We intend to do everything ourselves and to that end have learned how to bind books, both hardback and paperback.

We are looking to raise £10,000 to do the following:

1. We now need money for materials - the paper, ink, cloth, glue, mull, brushes etc that will be needed to continue.

2. We aim to purchase some basic equipment that will enable us to produce books at a sufficient rate. At the moment, we are improvising quite a bit, for example, we are lining up our text-blocks using a picture frame sawn in half to give us right-angles, and the books, once glued together, are pressed down with cookery books! This approach is not optimal. If we can get basic equipment - a small wooden book-press, for example, it would completely change how we worked.

3. We will need an ISBN number to make the physical books 'official'. That way, we can send them out for review and ask shops to stock them.

4. We would like to be able to fund some basic marketing of the book.

5. We are hoping to turn Lockdown Letters into an audio book. Any remaining funds would go into making this happen.

In return for your support, we have put together a series of exclusive gifts. We will add to the list as we go along and create more things. To begin with, we are offering:

Exclusive Preview Copies of the Book.

- Red, landscape, hardback. Signed by the Professor. (50 copies, numbered)

- Yellow, landscape, hardback. signed by the Professor. (3 copies, numbered)

On their way:

 - Exclusive, Professor Farnsworth Shakespeare notebook. Faux red leather cover. Blank pages and occasional printed pages (with images, quotations and surprises)

- Official Paperback Copy of the Book (portrait) Signed by the Professor.

- Handwritten thank you letter from the Professor.

- Original artwork by illustrator, Tracie Johnson.

Excerpt from 'The Lockdown Letters of Professor Farnsworth Shakespeare'

.......there I was in prison. I was pacing my cell like a dangerous criminal, pacing and pacing, and growling and scowling, and leering and sneering, and movin’ and a groovin’. Eventually, a guard came and took me to the visiting room where Tracie was waiting at a table, sitting next to a very stern looking woman.
“This is Cassandra Vegetable-Stew” said Tracie as she introduced me.
“A double-barrelled name, eh?” I said “Very posh.”
“She’s going to be representing you at the trial” said Tracie. I must have just sat there staring blankly at them because Vegetable-Stew began to explain.
“You’ve been arrested, Professor. On a very serious charge of running up to people and scaring them.”
“I see” I said. “I mean, I know. I was there.”
“Well now you’re here. And soon you’ll be over there, ‘there’ being a court room with a judge who will have to decide whether to send you back to prison or let you go free.”
“Hope it’s the second one!”
“Well, it’s my job to try and persuade the judge to let you go. I am, what is called a defence lawyer.”
“That’s great news. ......Er, just a moment...I have a question”
“Go on” said Vegetable-Stew.
“Well, first of all, I’m asking this for a friend, you understand, not for me. His name’s....Barnsworth....Rakeclear. Well, could you tell me – tell him – what would happen if, say, Barnsworth Rakeclear went into a chocolate shop and put a load of Scrummy Chewbars down his trousers and walked off with them without paying and then ate them all. I mean, if anyone said anything, I could get - he – he could get a defence lawyer and everything would be alright?”
“No, not exactly. In fact, not at all. Defence lawyers aren’t the only kind of lawyers out there. There is another type called a prosecution lawyer and their job is to try and persuade the judge to LOCK PEOPLE UP.”
“Oh, no, that’s terrible. Well, er, I’ll pass that on to old Barnsworth when I see him...I’ll tell him not to bother. That’s a shame though, I really like – I mean, he – really likes Scrummy Chewbars.
“Yes. Please do let Mr. Bakespeare know.” Said Vegetable-Stew. And then, something else occurred to me.
“Does that mean there’s a prosecution lawyer who’s going to try and persuade the judge to lock me up?”
“Yes. There will be a prosecution lawyer at your trial.”
“What? Why would someone do that? Who would do that? It must be someone who doesn’t like me or why else turn up and try and get me thrown into the clink? I know, I bet it’s Ranjit Barmiarmee, he’s always had it in for me ever since I tried to cheer him up by organising a flash mob for him at work. I mean, who doesn’t love a flashmob? I got a load of people to surprise him by pretending to be going about their day and then suddenly getting up and bursting into a song and dance right there and then, all around him:

‘I tell you what I want what I blinkin’ blunkin’ want
So tell me what ya want what you blinkin’ blunkin’ want
I really, really, really, wanna ziggazig ah....’

But did he appreciate it? No, all I got was ‘moan, moan, moan, this is inappropriate, whinge, whinge, I’m trying to conduct a funeral here, yaketty yak yak.’”
“No, no, no. A prosecution lawyer is a trained legal expert and it just so happens that their job is to argue that the person on trial should be found guilty and LOCKED UP.”
“Why? What kind of sicko does that?”
“It’s just a job, Professor.”
“Well, I think it stinks.”
“Professor, we seem to be missing the point here. Could I ask you to focus?”
“Alright” I said, and I leant forward, narrowed my eyes and stared at her very, very carefully.
“...on the case. Could we focus on your case? Could we talk about what we are going to do try and keep you out of prison?”
“That’s a good idea” I said and relaxed my eyes.
“Now, the situation is this” continued Vegetable-Stew. “You’ve been accused of running up to people and scaring them. The maximum sentence for such a crime is two years in the clink.”
“Two years!”
“So, we have to come up with a good defence.”
“I’m sorry” I said, “but this is not the time to be playing football.”
“No, a ‘defence’ is an argument for why you should be set free. So, Professor, why should you be let free?”
“Well, that’s obvious, isn’t it? I mean....well, if you look at it this way....er, after all is said and done, and not to put too fine a point on it.......it all comes down to, well, it’s just a matter of....and furthermore, I think you’ll find........ er.....Tracie? Any ideas?”
Tracie, who had been flicking through a TV guide and circling programmes to watch, looked up.
“That’s a very good question” she said. There was then a short silence.
“And what’s the very good answer?” I asked.
Tracie put down the TV guide and sighed heavily.
“I suppose you shouldn’t be put in jail because you didn’t mean anyone any harm. You were just being a bit of a plonker.”
“Brilliant!” I said.
“Yes” said Vegetable-Stew, “Tracie has hit the nail on the head. There was no malice intended.”
“Exactly. There was no-one called Alice there. That’s right.”
“No, not Alice - Malice. It means ‘bad intentions’. There were no bad intentions. You weren’t trying to do anything bad, were you?”
“No! Not at all, never.” I cried. “No malice. No malice intended, m’lud.”
“And so, with that in mind, I have obtained several witness statements to support our ‘he’s a plonker’ argument. Now, Professor, before you ask what a- ”
“What’s a witness statement?”
“- witness statement is, let me tell you. A witness is somebody who has seen or heard something useful to the case. A statement is the description of what that witness heard or saw. So, I have rounded up lots of people who have heard or seen you being a bit of a plonker. They are the witnesses. And these -” she took out a big pile of papers “are their statements. On each piece of paper someone has written about what a ridiculous spectacle you have made of yourself at some time or another.”
“Good stuff!” I said, “And how many of them are there?”
“Well, normally we like to get about three or four witness statements. However, fortunately for you, there are plenty of people who have seen you being a plonker.”
“And how many’s that, exactly?”
“Four hundred and twenty-seven” said Vegetable-Stew.
“Okay, okay. But I still have one concern. I’m not sure I’m happy about you calling me a plonker in front of a judge. Have you considered a different defence argument? Like, ‘He’s far too brilliant to go to jail’ or cute? I am pretty cute.”
“Professor” said Vegetable-Stew slowly, as if she were explaining something to a child rather than a brilliant-novelwriting-crimesolving-songsinging- inventionmaking-soulsearching-prisonsurviving-goldpantwearing genius.
“Believe me. This is your only hope.”

About the Author

Irfan Shah is a writer more usually involved with film history. He was the co-writer of the BAFTA-long-listed feature length documentary, The First Film, and has written for publications such as History Today, TIME (Online), TheTimes Educational Supplement and Cineaste.

The Lockdown Letters is his first - but not his last - children's book. He is currently writing a sequel and the Professor's adventures look set to continue!

Risks & Challenges

The advantage of this project is that, because we are making the books ourselves, we are not reliant upon any other person or business.

The disadvantage of this is the fact that everything rests on our shoulders and is reliant on our good health etc. We will factor this is in to our campaign by creating small stockpiles of gifts to ensure we are able to supply our supporters. Because the books are hand made, and not part of a large order waiting to be completed by a third party, every contribution will result in an immediate success - a finished book.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you do not want to purchase a book, please do tell anyone you think might enjoy it, about what we are doing. Word of mouth is incredibly important to us.

1. We now need money for materials - the paper, ink, cloth, glue, mull, brushes etc that will be needed to continue.
2. We aim to purchase some basic equipment that will enable us to produce books at a sufficient rate. At the moment, we are improvising quite a bit, for example, we are lining up our text-blocks using a picture frame sawn in half to give us right-angles, and the books, once glued together, are pressed down with cookery books! This approach is not optimal. If we can get basic equipment - a small wooden book-press, for example, it would completely change how we worked.
3. We will need an ISBN number to make the physical books 'official'. That way, we can send them out for review and ask shops to stock them.
4. We would like to be able to fund some basic marketing of the book.
5. We are hoping to turn Lockdown Letters into an audio book. Any remaining funds would go into making this happen.
In return for your support, we have put together a series of exclusive gifts. We will add to the list as we go along and create more things. To begin with, we are offering:
Exclusive Preview Copies of the Book.
- Red, landscape, hardback. Signed by the Professor. (50 copies, numbered)
- Yellow, landscape, hardback. signed by the Professor. (3 copies, numbered)
On their way:
 - Exclusive, Professor Farnsworth Shakespeare notebook. Faux red leather cover. Blank pages and occasional printed pages (with images, quotations and surprises)
- Official Paperback Copy of the Book (portrait) Signed by the Professor.
- Handwritten thank you letter from the Professor.
- Original artwork by illustrator, Tracie Johnson.

Excerpt from 'The Lockdown Letters of Professor Farnsworth Shakespeare'
.......there I was in prison. I was pacing my cell like a dangerous criminal, pacing and pacing, and growling and scowling, and leering and sneering, and movin’ and a groovin’. Eventually, a guard came and took me to the visiting room where Tracie was waiting at a table, sitting next to a very stern looking woman.“This is Cassandra Vegetable-Stew” said Tracie as she introduced me.“A double-barrelled name, eh?” I said “Very posh.”“She’s going to be representing you at the trial” said Tracie. I must have just sat there staring blankly at them because Vegetable-Stew began to explain.“You’ve been arrested, Professor. On a very serious charge of running up to people and scaring them.”“I see” I said. “I mean, I know. I was there.”“Well now you’re here. And soon you’ll be over there, ‘there’ being a court room with a judge who will have to decide whether to send you back to prison or let you go free.”“Hope it’s the second one!”“Well, it’s my job to try and persuade the judge to let you go. I am, what is called a defence lawyer.”“That’s great news. ......Er, just a moment...I have a question”“Go on” said Vegetable-Stew.“Well, first of all, I’m asking this for a friend, you understand, not for me. His name’s....Barnsworth....Rakeclear. Well, could you tell me – tell him – what would happen if, say, Barnsworth Rakeclear went into a chocolate shop and put a load of Scrummy Chewbars down his trousers and walked off with them without paying and then ate them all. I mean, if anyone said anything, I could get - he – he could get a defence lawyer and everything would be alright?”“No, not exactly. In fact, not at all. Defence lawyers aren’t the only kind of lawyers out there. There is another type called a prosecution lawyer and their job is to try and persuade the judge to LOCK PEOPLE UP.”“Oh, no, that’s terrible. Well, er, I’ll pass that on to old Barnsworth when I see him...I’ll tell him not to bother. That’s a shame though, I really like – I mean, he – really likes Scrummy Chewbars.“Yes. Please do let Mr. Bakespeare know.” Said Vegetable-Stew. And then, something else occurred to me.“Does that mean there’s a prosecution lawyer who’s going to try and persuade the judge to lock me up?”“Yes. There will be a prosecution lawyer at your trial.”“What? Why would someone do that? Who would do that? It must be someone who doesn’t like me or why else turn up and try and get me thrown into the clink? I know, I bet it’s Ranjit Barmiarmee, he’s always had it in for me ever since I tried to cheer him up by organising a flash mob for him at work. I mean, who doesn’t love a flashmob? I got a load of people to surprise him by pretending to be going about their day and then suddenly getting up and bursting into a song and dance right there and then, all around him:
‘I tell you what I want what I blinkin’ blunkin’ wantSo tell me what ya want what you blinkin’ blunkin’ wantI really, really, really, wanna ziggazig ah....’
But did he appreciate it? No, all I got was ‘moan, moan, moan, this is inappropriate, whinge, whinge, I’m trying to conduct a funeral here, yaketty yak yak.’”“No, no, no. A prosecution lawyer is a trained legal expert and it just so happens that their job is to argue that the person on trial should be found guilty and LOCKED UP.”“Why? What kind of sicko does that?”“It’s just a job, Professor.”“Well, I think it stinks.”“Professor, we seem to be missing the point here. Could I ask you to focus?”“Alright” I said, and I leant forward, narrowed my eyes and stared at her very, very carefully.“...on the case. Could we focus on your case? Could we talk about what we are going to do try and keep you out of prison?”“That’s a good idea” I said and relaxed my eyes.“Now, the situation is this” continued Vegetable-Stew. “You’ve been accused of running up to people and scaring them. The maximum sentence for such a crime is two years in the clink.”“Two years!”“So, we have to come up with a good defence.”“I’m sorry” I said, “but this is not the time to be playing football.”“No, a ‘defence’ is an argument for why you should be set free. So, Professor, why should you be let free?”“Well, that’s obvious, isn’t it? I mean....well, if you look at it this way....er, after all is said and done, and not to put too fine a point on it.......it all comes down to, well, it’s just a matter of....and furthermore, I think you’ll find........ er.....Tracie? Any ideas?”Tracie, who had been flicking through a TV guide and circling programmes to watch, looked up.“That’s a very good question” she said. There was then a short silence.“And what’s the very good answer?” I asked.Tracie put down the TV guide and sighed heavily.“I suppose you shouldn’t be put in jail because you didn’t mean anyone any harm. You were just being a bit of a plonker.”“Brilliant!” I said.“Yes” said Vegetable-Stew, “Tracie has hit the nail on the head. There was no malice intended.”“Exactly. There was no-one called Alice there. That’s right.”“No, not Alice - Malice. It means ‘bad intentions’. There were no bad intentions. You weren’t trying to do anything bad, were you?”“No! Not at all, never.” I cried. “No malice. No malice intended, m’lud.”“And so, with that in mind, I have obtained several witness statements to support our ‘he’s a plonker’ argument. Now, Professor, before you ask what a- ”“What’s a witness statement?”“- witness statement is, let me tell you. A witness is somebody who has seen or heard something useful to the case. A statement is the description of what that witness heard or saw. So, I have rounded up lots of people who have heard or seen you being a bit of a plonker. They are the witnesses. And these -” she took out a big pile of papers “are their statements. On each piece of paper someone has written about what a ridiculous spectacle you have made of yourself at some time or another.”“Good stuff!” I said, “And how many of them are there?”“Well, normally we like to get about three or four witness statements. However, fortunately for you, there are plenty of people who have seen you being a plonker.”“And how many’s that, exactly?”“Four hundred and twenty-seven” said Vegetable-Stew.“Okay, okay. But I still have one concern. I’m not sure I’m happy about you calling me a plonker in front of a judge. Have you considered a different defence argument? Like, ‘He’s far too brilliant to go to jail’ or cute? I am pretty cute.”“Professor” said Vegetable-Stew slowly, as if she were explaining something to a child rather than a brilliant-novelwriting-crimesolving-songsinging- inventionmaking-soulsearching-prisonsurviving-goldpantwearing genius.“Believe me. This is your only hope.”
About the Author
Irfan Shah is a writer more usually involved with film history. He was the co-writer of the BAFTA-long-listed feature length documentary, The First Film, and has written for publications such as History Today, TIME (Online), TheTimes Educational Supplement and Cineaste.
The Lockdown Letters is his first - but not his last - children's book. He is currently writing a sequel and the Professor's adventures look set to continue!

Risks & Challenges
The advantage of this project is that, because we are making the books ourselves, we are not reliant upon any other person or business.
The disadvantage of this is the fact that everything rests on our shoulders and is reliant on our good health etc. We will factor this is in to our campaign by creating small stockpiles of gifts to ensure we are able to supply our supporters. Because the books are hand made, and not part of a large order waiting to be completed by a third party, every contribution will result in an immediate success - a finished book.

Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you do not want to purchase a book, please do tell anyone you think might enjoy it, about what we are doing. Word of mouth is incredibly important to us.

story:
Short Summary

FlowerSong Press nurtures essential verse from, about, and throughout the borderlands, the nation, and the world.

FlowerSong Press is Literary. Lyrical. Boundless.

We are expanding and opened up Juventud Press our Children's/Young Adult Imprint as promised.

We will publish novice, emerging, and established writers of short stories and poetry. We are open to submissions all year long and will make it a goal to have a rapid response to every submission. 

We will continue to work with the City of McAllen and the Poet Laureate Anthology Series to publish the voices of the Rio Grande Valley Youth of south Texas. In 2021, we will be publishing Volume 4 in the series

The money will help pay to create beautiful books by hiring artists that specialize in creating cover art and more...

What We Need & What You Get

We had an aggressive 2019 - 2020 and don't plan on slowing down. We have our 2021-2022 line-up set and are already looking into 2023 and beyond. Because the money to create all these come from just one source and income it sometimes slows the process. With your help we can continue with this important work and hire some help.

The Impact

The impact can be huge. FlowerSong Press have spread across the nation and internationally, publishing stories and poetry of border poets across the world. With past donations we have been able to start our Children's/YA imprint Juventud Press to reach our young ones.

With two Children's books coming this year and one YA anthology on body Image already in print.

Risks & Challenges

With COVID-19 we've been having to reinvent the way we distribute and market our books. Through past ZOOM and future readings we hope to reach as many people and lovers of literature as we can. 

We are NOT a non-profit so it becomes hard to get donations via grants. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the news about our campaign. Visit our page www.flowersongpress.com or www.juventudpress.com and buy a book from one of our published authors.

story:
Second Amendment History

One of our interests is Gun Laws, another is Online Projects
Our plan with this project includes:

  • Research the Gun Laws & their History in the USA
  • Outline, Compare and Interview the Gun Owners Rights Groups 
  • Interview Key Players in the 2A Community
  • Archive & Publish the Results

All we need is some time

Your support will:

  • Give us time to build this project up
  • Pay for some server fees
  • The more we raise, the more elaborate it will be

The Goal

We will build an archive of information on USA 2A History:

  • The history of our US Gun Laws
  • Easy to find 2A Facts
  • Available for all (Research, Education)
  • We hope to inspire other creators 

Past Projects

In past years we have worked toward these goals on our 2A Websites & You Tube Channel
But we have not created the ultimate resource... yet

  • US Gun Laws Videos

  • Gun Owners Rights Groups Video

 

This Project

This time around we will focus on the history of:

Firearms Laws

  • Second Amendment to the United States Constitution (1791)
  • National Firearms Act (1934)
  • Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 (1968)
  • Gun Control Act (1968)
  • Arms Export Control Act (1976)
  • Firearms Owner's Protection Act (1986) 
  • SemiAutomatic Rifle Import Ban (1989)
  • Undetectable Firearms Act (1988)
  • Brady Handgun Violence Prevention Act (1993) (now defunct)
  • Federal Assault Weapons Ban (1994) (now defunct)
  • Protection of Lawful Commerce in Arms Act (2006)
  • State and Local Firearms Laws

Gun Owners Rights Groups

  • National Rifle Association (NRA)
  • National Shooting Sports Foundation (NSSF)
  • Second Amendment Foundation (SAF)
  • Gun Owners of America (GOA)
  • Citizens Committee for the Right to Keep and Bear Arms
  • Jews for the Preservation of Firearms Ownership (JPFO)
  • Pink Pistols
  • OpenCarry.org
  • Arizona Citizens Defense League
  • Armed Citizens Legal Defense Network
  • Firearms Policy Coalition (FPC)
  • Every 2nd Matters (E2M)

Risks & Challenges

This project has very little risk.
We will be building the archive no matter how much (or how little) we raise in this campaign
The more the campaign raises, the more time we can spend on this project and the more elaborate it can be

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute financially, but you can still help:

  • Get the word out
  • Make some noise about this campaign.
  • Make a You Tube Video
  • Use the IndieGoGo share tools for Facebook & Twitter

Thank You !!

story:
Come On Up to the House

Hi! My name's Dane Cobain and I'm an independent writer, poet and occasional musician. Come On Up to the House is my fifth release, a book that's been in the making since 2010 when I studied screenwriting as part of my creative writing studies at university.

Come On Up to the House is a horror novella and screenplay that follows the story of the Jersey family as they move into a house that's haunted by the spirit of a teenager who committed a bloody suicide. By supporting this campaign, you'll help to cover the cost of the editing and marketing involved to get the book out into as many people's hands as possible. And the more that people read it, the more likely it is that someone will take the screenplay and turn it into a movie!

What We Need & What You Get

This IndieGogo is a little different to most, because it's also a way for you to pre-order the book. As far as funding goes, it's a case of the more funding the project receives, the better. All funding from this IndieGogo will go towards marketing costs, and so the more that people pledge, the more that people will hear about it.

It's also set up as a flexible goal, which means that your pledges will go through whether the project meets the (arbitrary) goal of £500, which was chosen because that's the minimum amount that IndieGogo allows you to specify.

In return, backers receive a number of unique perks, depending upon how much they pledge, including:

  • Signed paperbacks ahead of the public launch
  • Your name included in a list of backers in future releases
  • Bookmarks, business cards and other goodies
  • A bespoke poem written using words of your choice
  • Copies of my other books

The Impact

By taking part in this campaign, you'll be able to help to make Come On Up to the House a reality, and you'll be able to grab yourself a copy of a badass horror book at the same time. This is my second horror book, and my first was probably my most successful release to date after it was published by Booktrope and reviewed dozens of times on major retailers' websites. Plus, you'll be helping me to pursue my career as a writer!

Risks & Challenges

There are no real risks or challenges as the book is already undergoing its final edit, with cover art created and ready to go. The project would come to fruition without IndieGogo - it just wouldn't reach as many people. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
'Breast Cancer affects one in 8 Women in America - including every woman in my family tree. As I was losing my Mother to the disease I decided I wanted to do something to help fund Breast Cancer Research and Awareness so I created the 'IN THE TUB' Book series - Portraits of Actors Recording Artists, Models, all using a Bathtub as a common setting.

'IN THE TUB' Volume 1 came out in 2013 and continues to do sales,  so...

Over the past three years 160 Celebs have taken the plunge to have their Portraits taken for 'IN THE TUB' Volume 2. Everyone Posed for Free - I financed the project entirley out of my own pocket and all the Profits from the book will be going to the F*ck Cancer Foundation.

This Campaign  will help us finance a large Production Run of the book… so we can sell a lot of books - raise a lot of money - and you can have the book on your Coffee Table in October for Breast Cancer Awareness Month.

I was behind the camera so believe me I know there are lot of intriguing images to look at… so now, It's time for you to jump "IN THE TUB"... and let’s All F*ck Cancer together!

TJ Scott - Director/Photographer

 

We're also partnering with FCancer to create a larger social media campaign and on ground program! FCancer, a tax-exempt 501(c) 3 registered charity co-founded by Yael Cohen Braun and Julie Greenbaum. Fuck Cancer aims to prevent, detect and unite against cancer.  FCancer looks at things differently, creates change and impact around preventing and finding cancer before it happens in addition to supporting those who have already been diagnosed. Through digital media, programs and events, FCancer believes its community will be the generation that ultimately improves health outcomes. For more information, visit LetsFCancer.com or follow @letsfcancer.

FCancer, a tax-exempt 501(c) 3 registered charity co-founded by Yael Cohen Braun and Julie Greenbaum. Fuck Cancer aims to prevent, detect and unite against cancer.  FCancer looks at things differently, creates change and impact around preventing and finding cancer before it happens in addition to supporting those who have already been diagnosed. Through digital media, programs and events, FCancer believes its community will be the generation that ultimately improves health outcomes. For more information, visit LetsFCancer.com or follow @letsfcancer. Here are the 160 super cool people you will find in 'IN THE TUB' Volume 2

story:
About the deck:

Because The Guardian of the Night is based on the traditional messages of the Rider-Waite-Smith Tarot, you will find this deck easy to connect with right from the box. Although I may tell the story a little differently, the underlying message and energy will be one that is comforting and familiar. 

  • Based on the traditional Rider-Waite-Smith card meanings, this deck will be easy to use for new Tarot readers as well as an interesting alternative for professional or well-seasoned tarot readers
  • 78 beautifully illustrated works of art that come together to create a collection that will offer an enchanting reading whether you pulling one card or many. 
  • independently produced by the artist, not sold on Amazon
  • Card Size 3"x5" premium 300gsm cardstock
  • Sturdy 2 Piece Box
  • MADE IN THE USA
  • Includes a signed by the artist full-size (5x8) guidebook
  • Eco-friendly packaging (no plastic wrapping)
  • Made with love by an artist who is passionate about creating—not just a tarot deck, but a collection of art that inspires you to travel within. 

Please visit my website to order your deck (includes PayPal!) 

The energy of The Guardian of the Night

There is no need to fear the dark, for the darkness does not concern itself with you. It has but one function—offer you an endless space to create. It is in the darkness, in the wee hours of the night, our inventive minds get busy from illustrating lavish, blissful dreams that keep us nestled warmly in our bed to nightmarish images and shadow creatures that lurk about on the walls filling our head full of dread. 

The Guardian of the Night Tarot offers guidance as we navigate our way through a dark time. It is not a tool to wash away or banish the darkness as it is here; many divine dreams emerge. Instead, this deck will help you uncover the gifts that nourish the soul. It will bring to your awareness of the beauty that lines the path. Walk confidently as your guide will also help you discover the pesky gremlins that set traps, hoping to keep you up for another sleepless night.  


No, there is no need to fear the dark for the shadow that dances around the room is you. 

Welcome to the Night

Your Guardian of the Night Tarot is full of nocturnal creatures who are accustomed to traveling through the darkness. These beautiful companions offer to you their talents, their natural ability to see, to create, to hunt while the rest of the world is asleep. 

Meet your guides:

The Guardian of the Night Tarot offers you a unique blend of energy as Tarot and animal spirits come together.  As the cards come to life, I draw upon each animal's essence as it is infused in every card of this deck, adding another layer of energy to your reading. From bats to bees, from elephants to elk, you will discover a global collection of animal energy ready to help guide you on your journey. The creatures of this deck offer to your reading their individual gift of wisdom and inspiration. 

For example, let's take spiders. Many people are terrified of spiders however the wisdom they share with us is as sprawling as the web they create. They teach us to be patient, to focus our energy on creating with an understanding that in time with the right preparation you will be rewarded. The spider is also a symbol of the strong feminine energy that is available to all of us and in many cultures it represents motherhood. 

Your guidebook will include information about each animal and how their energy not only contributes to the story each card holds, but also how you can apply their insights to help you gain a new perspective, discover clarity, and if needed find healing. 

Get a feel for the deck

Created for you to get a feel for the deck! Here is an online sample of the deck for you to try! You can move the cards around, stack them, swish them about until you feel that little tug that tells you to pull. 

https://www.guardianofthenight.com

Please note that this little extra project is still a work in progress, however with your support I will be able to put the entire deck online including the messages. 

 

Project Progress:

Expect updates. I send out updates for my projects about once a week. This is my fourth Tarot card crowdfunding campaign and I know keeping everyone updated is essential. If you are not signed up on Indiegogo for updates, please sign up to my site (no spam, just updates) - sign up at www.mjcullinane.com/signup 

I anticipate this deck shipping in September and will keep you posted along the way as we inch closer to that time. 

 

About the artist:

Hello, I'm MJ, and this is my fourth Tarot deck. My first deck, the Crow Tarot (winner of two 2019 CARTA awards), began my journey as a Tarot illustrator. However, I have been an artist for as long as I can recall. As per my mother, as I was too young to remember this event, apparently, at a young age, I went door to door trying to sell my drawings. Even back then, I knew I didn't want to make art as a hobby, I wanted art to be my career. This is my purpose; this is what I am here to do. It only took 45 some odd years to realize that my passion sits in the world of Tarot as I not only get to make the art I love—I also see how it benefits others. It's not just a pretty picture on the wall; it is a tool that brings clarity and joy, and hopefully, some appreciation for the artwork itself. I thoughtfully design each of my decks to be intuitive, and you will find the energy of each is unique. My latest deck began a month into our Shelter in Place order. I am a single mom of a kiddo who is now home from school for the rest of the year. The Guardian of the Night brings an energy of hope, a sense of sadness at times, and a recognition for what has been lost. It is very much a journey in the making. 

I hope you will join me on this trip as I think we could all use the company. 
Peace,
MJ

story:
Story of My Book

The Pursuit of Purpose is a book that calls out the empty promises found in the cultural norm of living for our own happiness. A better pursuit exists that can actually lead to true fulfillment, and it begins by discovering our purpose.

My name is Tyler Wedell, and I am the author of The Pursuit of Purpose. I wrote this book because I wanted to help people find and live out their life’s calling. After reaching a low point in high school, I found myself depressed and questioning my existence. But when God showed me that my life had a purpose, everything changed. I wanted to give others the same opportunity I experienced to live for something greater.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover there is more to life than simply chasing happiness. We each have a purpose ingrained in the fabric of our lives, and the world is waiting for us to share it. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for living life with meaning. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you discover the unique purpose you have and how to live it out.

In this book, you'll learn where to look for clues to find your calling and how to have the faith needed to pursue it. You'll hear stories about...

  • Michael Phelps, the most decorated Olympian of all time, who found himself at the lowest moment of his life after he had accomplished everything he wanted. But winning gold medals and retiring at a young age didn’t compare to the fulfillment he found in discovering his life had a purpose that was so much bigger.
  • Adam Braun, who started the non-profit Pencils of Promise, which builds schools around the world. After a trip overseas, he discovered a desire to help poverty stricken kids get access to an education. His passion began to point him to a purpose he couldn’t turn away from, one that truly made him feel alive.
  • Rebekah Gregory, one of the survivors from the Boston Marathon bombing, who shares how the deep pain of getting blown up and losing her leg actually led to a significant platform for purpose. Finding the meaning through her trauma has allowed her to not only take back her life, but helped change the lives of others along the way.

 

You will love this book if you are looking for something more than the endless pursuit of happiness, want to live a life of meaning and fulfillment, or if you know you have a purpose but aren’t sure how to find it.

The Pursuit of Purpose is a nonfiction book that speaks to students and adults who have a desire to live for something more but aren’t sure what it is and want to look at finding purpose in a new way.

The Book - The Pursuit of Purpose

The book is written in 3 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-4. This section calls out the empty promises of pursing happiness and lays the foundation needed to build purpose upon. It looks at the power purpose can have and the mindset we need to be able to realize its potential. The last thing we need is something else to add to our to-do list — our lives are busy enough. By realizing that we already hold within us immense purpose, we can step into the mindset to start living with that purpose instead of simply striving after something new.

Part 2 contains chapters 5-9. This section lays out the pillars of purpose within our lives that allow us to identify the clues that point to our calling. It will provide practical tools to begin to realize the meaning our lives hold, which is waiting to be unleashed upon the world. There is a reason we have certain passions, talents, experiences, and opportunities. When we explore each one, we will begin to see a common theme emerge that will lay out a clear path to our purpose.

Part 3 contains chapters 10-12. This section explores the faith needed to live out our calling in a way that will actually sustain us and lead to true fulfillment. Many good intentions die before they see the light of day. Discovering our purpose is only just the beginning. Having the faith to see we are all connected to a bigger story, combined with the ability to take action and stay present, will allow us the capacity to see our calling through and make a difference in the world.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer.

 

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

About the Author

Tyler Wedell is a financial advisor and a follower of Jesus. He loves his job helping people plan and invest for the future, and also has a passion for deep conversations in helping people navigate life. His hobbies include hiking and camping in the mountains, landscape photography, indoor rock climbing, cycling, playing guitar, and reading for personal growth.

He wrote this book as an expression of his own desire to live with purpose. Ever since high school, he felt called to write a book that would one day inspire others to discover and live out their calling. He hopes his experience will encourage others to begin this new journey to live with purpose.

When he is not spending his free time writing, he is probably meal prepping ten identical meals for the week, planning his next trip to explore the great outdoors, or riding his bike along the Chicago lakefront. His new hobby of drone flying is also just starting to take off!

For more information, you can connect with Tyler at tylerwedell@hotmail.com and on Instagram at @twedell or @thepursuitofpurpose_book.

 

 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #ThePursuitOfPurpose and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

 

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!
Tyler

story:
Welcome to our table!

We are a mother daughter duo that has created a cookbook that we are both truly proud of. My name is Harriet and I have written and tested every recipe that will be in this book. Some of these recipes have been passed down from my mother and others are recipes that my daughter, Chantel, and I have created. It's all about being simplistic. We have faced several challenges over the years, so simplicity is what we and many others truly need when it comes to getting into the kitchen.

What We Need & What You Get

The cookbook manuscript is complete!

Our funding goal of $2,500.00 will cover the expense of printing the first batch of hardcover cookbooks and give first dibs to our backers.

Check out these perks!

All backers will be listed in the "Special Thank-You" section of the book.  Every dollar counts! There are worthy perks for each contribution level from a digital PDF of the cookbook itself to signed copies and an apron to motivate you to get into the kitchen with the ones you love.

All perks will be delivered between the end of July and mid August 2019.

The Impact

By contributing to our campaign, you would not only be getting a great cookbook, you would also be investing in a life long dream and reminding others that dreams are still worth chasing.

Other Ways You Can Help
