story:
While in San Juan, Texas working with La Union del Pueblo Entero, we hope to:
  • Learn about immigration reform and immigrant rights organizing through local house meetings
  • Witness and learn about the US-Mexico border wall
  • Volunteer in Colonias, low-income neighborhoods along the border
  • Work with Proyecto Azteca to refurbish and construct parts of housing units for low-income residents
  • Visit El Milagro Clinic
  • Meet with workers to learn about economic justice and workers rights
  • Visit La Posada Shelter to learn about immigrant detention
  • Meet with civil rights activists to learn about the work to combat human rights abuses at the border
  • ….and much more!

The money we raise will be given directly to LUPE. Your generosity will help their organization continue serving their members, especially those struggling through poverty, allowing them to benefit from our low cost social services and through their participation in LUPE’s community organizing program. 

  • $20 helps provide one hour of leadership development to 15 LUPE leaders
  • $50 helps LUPE provide five hours of English classes for thirty immigrants trying to make a better life for their family

Want to help more? We still have spots for 5 more volunteers to go to San Juan with us! http://illinoisasb.org/

I have been writing poetry since I was eleven years old, and I've always dreamed of sharing my work with others. I decided to create a book, and I want to print at least a hundred copies. I plan on using Lulu.com or a similar printing company, but I need your help! As a young college student, there's no way I can afford this on my own.
But this project is about more than just a book. A percentage of the books I create will be donated to youth in juvenile detention centers in the Salt Lake City, Utah area. The more money I raise for my project, the more I can donate!
For more information about The Sixteen Summers Project please visit: thesixteensummersproject.com

story:
Hello! My name is Nathan Cadbury and I've been studying, applying and writing about various “self-help” topics for a few years now. But I've never been as excited about a project as I am about the "Climb Any Mountain" book.

I truly believe that what I've uncovered and compiled is a simple "formula" that works. It can work for anyone, anywhere, at any time to “set and get” virtually any goal they truly decide upon.

What Is It?

Climb Any Mountain is essentially a 7-step system for achieving whatever one wants in life. It’s about waking up, taking charge and never looking back. This book represents the collective wisdom of many -- from years gone by, right up until the present day. I didn’t invent these concepts. I merely brought the pieces together in a way that makes sense and produces results.

It’s a “formula” for achieving meaningful goals. I’m not talking about “smart goals” or making those tiny, incremental improvements to one’s life. I’m talking about BIG DREAMS – goals worth going for with everything you’ve got... goals that make life exciting... and goals that change everything for the better.

Life can be like a giant jigsaw puzzle. But the problem is that we're missing the KEY PIECE -- the completed picture that shows how it all is supposed to come together in the end. That’s where Climb Any Mountain comes in with its step-by-step system. It’s gentle guidance and practical actions steps will enable anyone to overcome obstacles to achieve more and live life to the fullest – by their own definitions.

With your help, I'd like to share my discoveries and help people in a much grander way than I ever could do solo. I want to bring this book to life -- make it as good as it can be – and self-publish Climb Any Mountain to positively impact as many lives around the world as possible.

I invite you to be a part of this exciting journey. It’s an opportunity to make a positive contribution by showing others the way and leading them to fulfill their desires. Beyond basic life survival skills, I can't think of a more useful lesson to share -- and this one can serve the reader for a lifetime.

What You Get When You Back Me on This Project

  1. My personal guarantee of delivery. This project will be completed as stated and on time.
  2. A feeling of satisfaction and contribution. You can proudly say “I helped make this project happen”.
  3. A variety of perks including a simple THANK YOU message by personal email, digital or print copies of the book, your name on our website and on the “Special Acknowledgments” page in the printed version, PDF and print covers identifying you as a Publishing Partner and MORE.

All perks will be sent out promptly – within 30 days – of the close of this campaign.

What I Bring to the Table

-          A keen interest in the subject and a passion for sharing helpful ideas

-          Experience in writing, self-publishing and marketing

-          A completed, detailed outline covering each chapter of the book

What I Need

I’m seeking funding for the following elements of this project:

  1. Professional Cover Design (A skilled designer can make a world of difference to a book’s sales and the more it sells, the more effective the impact of one’s message.)
  2. Editing and Proofing (Another important part – not just as far as sales and reviews go – but to enhance the reader’s overall experience with a more professional product.)
  3. Marketing and Promotion (Virtually all successful books have been supported by effective marketing and promotions and doing it the right way costs money.)
  4. An initial print run of 2000 copies to increase the book’s distribution and exposure

The Impact of Your Contribution

With your help, you become not just a sponsor, but a collaborator. – Your valued assistance enables me to package and present this important message of goal achievement and breakthrough success in a way that interests, engages and powerfully impacts people.

I’m committed to this project 100%. It will see the light of day – rain or shine. There’s no question about it. I’ve written and published 4 books to date in the “self-help” category. But I feel in my heart that this is THE ONE that’s going to breakthrough and connect with the largest, global audience yet.

With your support, Climb Any Mountain can impact many lives. I sense that the “trick” to reaching a larger audience is to make a splash and do it up right – in fine style. And that’s what professional design and editing will do. It makes sense because a quality publication tends to get more respect, more attention and more buzz in the marketplace. In turn, this means the message within can potentially serve more people – wherever on this beautiful planet they happen to live.

Contributing to this project makes you part of something positive and life-enhancing in a world that at times, can appear anything but. My unique approach makes setting and getting meaningful goals a realistic and worthwhile endeavour for anyone with the desire for something more.

Other Ways You Can Help

I sincerely appreciate you taking the time to check out this campaign – VERY COOL of you. And I would sincerely like to THANK YOU for your fantastic support! Every dollar counts and I assure you that each contribution will help make this a better quality product and get this “formula” into more hands that need it.

If you are temporarily short of cash at the present time and can’t contribute, I understand. (Believe me, I do!) Or, if you prefer to wait until the book is published before claiming your own copy, that’s fine too. However, there IS a way you could be a HUGE HELP today and ensure the success of Climb Any Mountain – here’s how:

Please let your family, friends, colleagues and acquaintances know about this campaign. Call, email, blog about it, chat up your co-workers at the water cooler or coffee machine – or use the Share Buttons on this page to help spread the word. However you choose to help – I thank you VERY MUCH and appreciate this more than you know.

story:
Who are you?

Hello Everyone! 

I'm Erica "RivaFlowz" Buddington. I'm an educator, writer, and performance artist.

"Free Verse" is a project that is near and dear to me. It started out as a poem and blossomed into an unforgettable tale of lovers, in a generation that's barely expounded upon. We are innovators, lovers of renaissance, and everything magical. I’ve created this piece of work specifically for you.

My protagonist, Jai, is raised in a brownstone that’s converted into a bookstore, by her father. Her father, a revered patriarch of the community, raises a woman with a love of the literary. The environment, around them, changes constantly, as does the families that reside there. When a tragic incident occurs, Jai is forced to leave Brooklyn.

“Free Verse” is a journey in which Jai finds her way back home, literally and metaphorically, through a love interest and the journals her father leaves behind.

I’ve been invited to participate in the Callaloo Writing Workshop that will take place at Brown University this year. I’ve also found an editor that is willing to edit my work, to the tee, for a fraction of the usual cost. 

Where's it all going? What do I recieve?

I've got some awesome perks for your donation. Depending on how much you've given, you'll recieve one or more of these:1) A poem written just for you and a thank you email. 2) The entire novella, the finished version, "Unintentional Stereotype", in your email. Read part 1, 2, 3. 3) An online writing workshop. 4) A personal performance and workshop for your organization/school/friends. 

How can I help, if I can't donate?

Even if you can't afford to donate, sharing the video means just as much. Use the Indiegogo share tools. 

 

What's the impact?

In the literary world, where everything contemporary and amazing is pre hip-hop and bereft of the nuances of today, what's missing is a book that explores US, right now. There are several gems, that go unrecognized because of a publishing industry that isn't good at lending out chances. There's a young generation that's still waiting for their era to be included in the confines of good literature. I am out to write these texts, one book at a time. 

If I've got yet to make you believer, check out a few of the articles/stories on www.rivaflowz.com. 

 

For every one who took the time out to read, donate, share, comment; for all those who've done so in the past: Thank you, in advance.

story:
A world first...

Hi fellow nurses and welcome to the website that is the base for the upcoming "nurses fyi" magazine that will be launched via Apple's Newsstand for your iPad.

I have been nursing for 25 years (the past 13 in Patient Transport) and I am excited to be in the planning phase of what I believe to be the worlds first electronic international nurses magazine.

I have launched a Crowd funding campaign over at www.indiegogo.com/nursesfyi  to raise the necessary funds ($2,500) to bring the nurses magazine into reality and to cover the production and setup costs for the first four monthly editions.

The initial edition will be free and then each subsequent monthly edition will be $3.99 (about the cost of a cup of coffee) to help cover costs.

The magazine will have stories by nurses for nurses from all over the world. It will look to build a community of nurses who enjoy reading about issues and topics that unite nurses the world over.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

    • Nurses fyi Crowd funding Figures:

1/ Production costs for first four editions     $1200

2/ Company setup   $483

3/ Legal contract for submissions to magazine      $250

4/ Advertising     $300

                                                         Total   $2,233

  

  • Perks:  Your help will ensure the success of this project.
    • For a $10 donation your name will be added to the "Bronze Supporter" section of both the nurses fyi website and in the first four editions of the magazine.
    • For a $20 donation your name will be added to the "Silver Supporter" section of both the nurses fyi website and in the first four editions of the magazine.
    • For a $50 donation your name will be added to the "Gold Supporter" section of both the nurses fyi website and in the first four editions of the magazine.
    • For a $100 donation your name will be added to the "Platinum Supporter" section of both the nurses fyi website and in the first four editions of the magazine.
    • For a $350 donation "Advertisers Special" your company’s story (logo, pictures, video, text, link to website) of how your company helps nurses will be added to Advertisers section of the first four editions of the magazine ($87.50/edition).
  • If just $1200 is raised one edition will be launched and additional funding sought.

The Impact

 This will be the first international digital nurses magazine by nurses for nurses.

  • This project will fill what I believe to be the void that currently exists for nurses everywhere to be able to have ready access to an international nurses magazine with issues and topics that we want to read about in a digital magazine that you can carry with you on the iPad.
  • As the magazine will be about everything nursing...nurses will be able to read articles and stories, view videos, join webinars and make submissions for consideration to be included in future editions of the magazine. 
  • I am very confident I have the ability and determination to carry this project through to completion...and by doing so I will be fulfilling a dream of mine.
  • I have previously been a paid blogger for a professional nursing blog (nurses uncut), so I can write engaging nursing articles for nurses on a variety of nursing topics.
  • I have already built the website for the magazine www.nursesfyi.com
  • I have a professional production company teed up to produce this magazine (they have 150 magazines already in Apple's Newsstand).
  • I have been trained at NIDA (National Institute of Dramatic Arts) a prestigious film school to produce short films that will help record and edit videos I want to add to the magazine.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Nurses nowadays seem to love social media in particular Facebook and Twitter so please help by sending a message about the campaign via any means available.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools

This project can make a difference to the nursing world and I am very excited by its huge potential to make a positive difference to nurses having ready access each month to find out what is happening in the nursing world.

story:
Lies, Damned Lies

Hello, I'm Greg Crites, author of twenty-three novels, none of which made the New York Times bestseller lists and never will because there is a worldwide conspiracy to destroy me. My enemies are legion. Death awaits me around every corner... what? Oh. Forget all that other stuff above. I thought this was my bio for a conspiracy site. Yes, 23 novels. I wrote 'em. I created audiobooks from them. Over two-million downloads of those chapters. Thousands upon thousands of audiobooks sold and enjoyed. I don't submit to others. I don't seek agents, deals, blurbs, advertising, sponsors (unless you are a liquor distributor, then let's talk) This is a one-man operation run out of wherever I happen to be.


What Will happen

Readers/listeners wish me to finish writing this book, while I wish to continue drinking undisturbed. It's an impasse that only be forded by paying me an advance. If we can successfully fund this venture I'll be left with no choice other than to finish the thing.


What I Need & What You Get

I need liquor money. No. Ignore that. I need money to print copies of Crusade II. Being a small firm whose primary investments are tied up in rum bottles, err.. stock derivatives, I can't afford to print books. Yeah, that's it. I need money to print the books.


Other Ways You Can Help

Help get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Use these stupid 'share' tools. I'm not on Facebook, so I'm relying on you to make some noise over there.

Oh! And If you missed listening to the first CRUSADE audiobook, get it free, go here, scroll down beneath the video, click buy button, enter CRUSADE in the coupon spaceâ€”and it's FREE!
